section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 87-5546, Franklin versus Lynaugh, will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: In this case which is here from the Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit, six of us agreed that the judgment of the Court of Appeals should be affirmed.
There has not an opinion for the Court, however, I have filed an opinion which the Chief Justice, Justice Scalia, and Justice Kennedy have joined.
Justice O'Connor has filed an opinion concurring in the judgment and Justice Blackmun has joined that opinion.
Justice Stevens has filed a dissenting opinion in which Justices Brennan and Marshall have joined.
